verbose_text: It is interesting to note that PY mutated Ndfip1 completely restores cell surface Robo1, while PY mutated Ndfip2 results only in a partial restoration of surface Robo1, suggesting that the mutant version of Ndfip2 still retains some ability to regulate Robo1.
evidence: PY mutated Ndfip1 completely restores cell surface Robo1
